verses.kjv: And as he went out of the temple, one of his disciples saith unto him, Master, see what manner of stones and what buildings are here!
verses.ct: As Jesus was leaving the temple, one of his disciples said to him, "Teacher, look at these incredible stones and amazing buildings!"

verses.kjv: And Jesus answering said unto him, Seest thou these great buildings? there shall not be left one stone upon another, that shall not be thrown down.
verses.ct: Jesus replied, "You see these massive buildings? Not a single stone will be left standing on another. Every one of them will be torn down."

verses.kjv: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple, Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately,
verses.ct: Later, while he was sitting on the Mount of Olives across from the temple, Peter, James, John, and Andrew came to him privately.

verses.kjv: Tell us, when shall these things be? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled?
verses.ct: "Tell us," they said, "when will this happen? And what will be the sign that all of this is about to take place?"

verses.kjv: And Jesus answering them began to say, Take heed lest any man deceive you:
verses.ct: Jesus began telling them, "Be careful that no one misleads you.

verses.kjv: For many shall come in my name, saying, I am Christ; and shall deceive many.
verses.ct: Many people will show up claiming to speak with my authority, saying, 'I am the Christ,' and they will mislead large numbers of people.

verses.kjv: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars, be ye not troubled: for such things must needs be; but the end shall not be yet.
verses.ct: When you hear about wars and reports of wars, don't be alarmed. These things have to happen, but it won't be the end yet.

verses.kjv: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
verses.ct: One nation will go to war against another, and one kingdom against another. There will be earthquakes in various regions, along with famines and upheaval. All of this is just the early stages of the suffering to come.

verses.kjv: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.
verses.ct: But watch out for yourselves. People will hand you over to local courts, and you will be beaten in synagogues. You will stand trial in front of governors and kings because of me, as a witness to them.

verses.kjv: And the gospel must first be published among all nations.
verses.ct: But first, the good news must be proclaimed to every nation.

verses.kjv: But when they shall lead you, and deliver you up, take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak, neither do ye premeditate: but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour, that speak ye: for it is not ye that speak, but the Holy Ghost.
verses.ct: When they arrest you and put you on trial, don't worry ahead of time about what to say. Don't rehearse your words. Instead, say whatever is given to you in that moment, because it won't be you speaking — it will be the Holy Spirit.

verses.kjv: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death, and the father the son; and children shall rise up against their parents, and shall cause them to be put to death.
verses.ct: Brothers will turn against their own brothers and hand them over to be killed. Fathers will do the same to their children. Children will rebel against their parents and have them executed.

verses.kjv: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name’s sake: but he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
verses.ct: Everyone will hate you because of me. But whoever stands firm through it all will be saved.

verses.kjv: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation, spoken of by Daniel the prophet, standing where it ought not, (let him that readeth understand,) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains:
verses.ct: "When you see the disgusting thing that causes devastation — the one Daniel the prophet spoke about — standing where it should never be (let the reader pay attention to this), then those in Judaea should escape to the mountains.

verses.kjv: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house, neither enter therein, to take any thing out of his house:
verses.ct: If you're on the roof of your house, don't go back inside to grab anything.

verses.kjv: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment.
verses.ct: If you're out in the field, don't go back to get your coat.

verses.kjv: But woe to them that are with child, and to them that give suck in those days!
verses.ct: How terrible it will be for pregnant women and nursing mothers during those days!

verses.kjv: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter.
verses.ct: Pray that this doesn't happen during winter.

verses.kjv: For in those days shall be affliction, such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time, neither shall be.
verses.ct: Because the suffering in those days will be worse than anything that has happened since the beginning, when God created the world, up to now — and nothing like it will ever happen again.

verses.kjv: And except that the Lord had shortened those days, no flesh should be saved: but for the elect’s sake, whom he hath chosen, he hath shortened the days.
verses.ct: If the Lord had not cut those days short, no one would survive. But for the sake of his chosen people, he has cut those days short.

verses.kjv: And then if any man shall say to you, Lo, here is Christ; or, lo, he is there; believe him not:
verses.ct: At that time, if anyone tells you, 'Look, the Christ is here!' or 'He's over there!' — don't believe it.

verses.kjv: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise, and shall shew signs and wonders, to seduce, if it were possible, even the elect.
verses.ct: False messiahs and false prophets will appear and perform signs and wonders to deceive, if possible, even God's chosen people.

verses.kjv: But take ye heed: behold, I have foretold you all things.
verses.ct: So stay alert. I've warned you about everything ahead of time."

verses.kjv: But in those days, after that tribulation, the sun shall be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light,
verses.ct: "In those days, after that period of suffering, the sun will go dark, and the moon will stop shining.

verses.kjv: And the stars of heaven shall fall, and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken.
verses.ct: Stars will fall from the heavens, and the cosmic powers will be shaken.

verses.kjv: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory.
verses.ct: Then everyone will see the Son of Man arriving in the clouds with tremendous power and glory.

verses.kjv: And then shall he send his angels, and shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven.
verses.ct: He will send out his angels to gather his chosen people from every direction — from the farthest reaches of the earth to the farthest reaches of heaven.

verses.kjv: Now learn a parable of the fig tree; When her branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer is near:
verses.ct: "Now learn a lesson from the fig tree: When its branches become soft and start sprouting leaves, you know summer is close.

verses.kjv: So ye in like manner, when ye shall see these things come to pass, know that it is nigh, even at the doors.
verses.ct: In the same way, when you see these things taking place, you'll know that it is near, right at the door.

verses.kjv: Verily I say unto you, that this generation shall not pass, till all these things be done.
verses.ct: I tell you the truth: this generation will not die off before all these things have happened.

verses.kjv: Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.
verses.ct: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

verses.kjv: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man, no, not the angels which are in heaven, neither the Son, but the Father.
verses.ct: However, no one knows the exact day or hour when this will happen — not the angels in heaven, not even the Son — only the Father knows.

verses.kjv: Take ye heed, watch and pray: for ye know not when the time is.
verses.ct: Stay alert! Keep watching and praying, because you don't know when the time will come.

verses.kjv: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey, who left his house, and gave authority to his servants, and to every man his work, and commanded the porter to watch.
verses.ct: It's like a man going on a long trip. He left his house and put his servants in charge, assigning each one a specific task, and he told the doorkeeper to stay watchful.

verses.kjv: Watch ye therefore: for ye know not when the master of the house cometh, at even, or at midnight, or at the cockcrowing, or in the morning:
verses.ct: So stay watchful, because you don't know when the owner of the house will return — whether in the evening, at midnight, at dawn when the rooster crows, or in the morning.

verses.kjv: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping.
verses.ct: If he shows up without warning, don't let him find you asleep.

verses.kjv: And what I say unto you I say unto all, Watch.
verses.ct: What I'm telling you, I'm telling everyone: Stay watchful!"
